accost.name: Accost
accost.desc: ([User's AS - Foe's AS] + [User's HP/2])% chance for another round of combat (can repeat 2-20 times) if user is at 25 HP or higher.

adept.name: Adept
adept.desc: (Attack Speed + 20)% for the user to do two consecutive strikes

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: (Skill)% chance for the user to do 5 consecutive strikes in a row. Cannot simultaneously active Sol or Luna. Can only be inherited by foot locked units with sword access at base.

bargain.name: Bargain
bargain.desc: User can buy items or repair for half-price in shops.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Allies within a 3 tile radius receive +10 accuracy and avoid.

critical.name: Critical
critical.desc:
Allows the user to perform critical hits.
Critical chance = (Skill + [Weapon's kills - 50])%.
Granted to any weapons with 50+ kills.

dance.name: Dance
dance.desc: Allows all adjacent allies to move again.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: (Skill)% chance to ignore foe's defense. Cannot simultaneously active Astra or Sol. Can only be inherited by foot locked units with sword access at base.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: If user is at 10 HP or below, their avoid is increased by [(11 - HP) x 10] for one turn. Doesn't work in arena if user enters it at already 10 HP or less.

nihil.name: Nihil
nihil.desc: Negates foe's swords skills (Luna, Sol, Astra), critical hits and effective weapons during combat.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.desc: (Level)% chance to completely negate a attack.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc:
Allows the user to double.
Double = User's Attack Speed > Foe's Attack Speed

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc: Restores 5~10 of the user's HP at the start of each turn.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: (Skill)% chance to restore HP as the same amount of damage dealt to foe. Cannot simultaneously active Astra or Luna. Can only be inherited by foot locked units with sword access at base.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Steals all of the enemy's gold on hit.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: User strikes first if foe initiates combat and negates enemy's accost if unit at half HP or below.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc: Guaranteed critical hit if user's current HP <= (Max HP/2) + 1.

holysword.name: Holy Sword
holysword.desc:
(??)% chance to trigger on user's or foe's strike.
**User:** Increases damage by 20.
**Foe:** Decreases damage by 20.

darknesssword.name: Darkness Sword
darknesssword.desc:
(??)% chance to trigger on user's or foe's strike.
**User:** Multiplies damage by 1, 2 or 3.
**Foe:** Decreases damage by 20.
